Metadata.Title: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package azcopy for versions less than 10.24.0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2023-45288 affecting package azcopy for versions less than 10.24.0-1. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package azcopy is earlier than 10.24.0-1, affected by CVE-2023-45288
